description: An illustration of three wooden blocks arranged in a loose pyramid (which is to say, one stacked atop the other two). The top block has a red border on its front-facing side with a red, capital A in the center. The bottom left block has a green border on its front-facing side with a green, capital B in the center. The bottom right block has a yellow border on its front-facing side with a yellow, capital C in the center. The illustration is made up of a series of triangles of various sizes.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
